message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000.  It's in great condition and I think you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to consider $9,500 for the product?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. Let's try to find a solution that works for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to consider $9,800 for the product?
Bob, I'm getting close to my limit.  $9,800 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to go down to $10,200.  If we can't find a compromise here, I'll have to look at other options.
I understand you're getting close to your limit, but I'm still trying to make a good deal. Would you be willing to consider $9,500 again? I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
